channel.title: Adding AntiRandoms and Random Movements
channel.description:
I need someone to assist me in adding anti randoms and just random movements in my script.. When I say random movement, I just mean like checking stats, emote, etc. And I need to put the latest random event solvers, so help please!
P.S. I'm new to Scar, so don't laugh.

item.title: Adding AntiRandoms and Random Movements
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

mopman does have a point.

i personally dont like having talking antibans because it slows down my scripts and generally gets on my tits.

however, people likes to have antibans that talk back for the simple reason that it gives them that extra security that they wont get banned
plus it makes the script look more, lets say professional

Read full topic

item.title: Adding AntiRandoms and Random Movements
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

junkj:

for instance, like for chopping a tree and someone says hi and your a lvl 20 and you dont say hi back of course they are gonna know your a macroing!

If Jagex ban for that, they’re stupid.
I never spoke to people when I was playing RS, because 99.9% of the population were fucking retarded, not because I was cheating.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding AntiRandoms and Random Movements
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

Adding anti ban not that hard.

use this from the srl manual:

boredhuman;

and some talking stuff.

procedure hello;
begin
if inchat('hello')or
   inchat('hi')or
   inchat('hey')or
   inchat('yo')or
   inchat(name)then
   typesend('hey')
end;

procedure whatsup;
begin
if inchat('whats up')or
   inchat('whats new')or
   inchat('whats the 411')then
   typesend('nothing')
end;

procedure friends;
begin
if inchat('friends')or
   inchat('frends')or
   inchat('buddys')or
   inchat('add')or
   inchat('add me')then
   typesend('sorry,got lots of them')
end;

Thats like anti-ban. (from my autofighter)
Anti-ban is something that you wont get banned for.

for instance, like for chopping a tree and someone says hi and your a lvl 20 and you dont say hi back of course they are gonna know your a macroing!

when using a talking procedure you wont get banned if smeone says hi because youll say hi back.

Antirandoms…

use this.
(ill give you better ones soon)

procedure hatetherandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
  Wait(1000);
   FindTalk;
   Wait(1000);
   FindDead;
   Wait(1000);
   FindMime;
   Wait(1000);
   FindMaze;
   Wait(1000);
   FindQuiz;
   Wait(1000);
   FindScapeRune;
   Wait(1000);
   ClickToContinue;
   Wait(1000);
   SolveFrog;
   Wait(1000);
   FindTalk;
   wait(1000)
   Findmod;
end;

Glad i can help if i did help.

Read full topic

Isn’t there something like an AntiBan; in SRL?
